藋字的基本解释

藜类植物。

藋

藋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［diào］
［《廣韻》徒弔切，去嘯，定。］
草名。又名灰藋，似藜。

藋字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　藋； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1064第06
【唐韻】徒弔切，音掉。【說文】釐草也。【莊子·徐無鬼】夫逃虛空者，藜藋柱乎鼪鼬之徑。　又【爾雅·釋草】拜蔏藋。【註】蔏藋赤似藜。　又【詩·大雅】菫荼如飴。【疏】廣雅云：菫，藋也，今三輔之閒言猶然。　又【博雅】藋梁，木稷也。　又直角切，音濯。蒴藋，藥草。　又音翟。灰藋。【本草註】梁?文帝《勸醫文》作灰?菜。

藋字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
藋字的起名意思

暂无。

Scum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［diào］
["Guangyun" only hangs and cuts, goes to whistle, and sets. ]
Cursive name. Also known as gray stalk, resembling quinoa.
Scum
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　藋; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1064 Page 06
[Tang Yun] Hanging and cutting, the sound is lost. [Said Wen] Li Cao also. [Zhuangzi·Xu Wugui] A husband who escapes from the void, the quinoa column is like the path of the weasel.　[Erya·Shucao] pay homage to Lian藋. [Note] The 菋藋 red is like quinoa.　[Poetry·Daya] Flourish is like a glutinous rice. [Sparse] Guang Yayun: 菫, 藋 Ye, the gossip of Sansuke is still there.　[Bo Ya] Hou Liang, Mu Ji Ye.　Cut again at right angles, sound. Capsules, herb.　You Yin Di. Ash. [Notes on Materia Medica] Liang Wendi's "Wen to Advise Medicine" is used as ash dish.
